players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm the detective. Alice is mafia. Be cautious, Diana."
You: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. I'm planning to frame him."
Charlie: "Bob, consider my alibi for last night. I was with Diana."
Bob: "Charlie, keep your alibi close. Alice is framing you."
You: "Charlie, stay quiet. I framed you."
Charlie: "I was with Diana last night. Check her alibi too."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm the detective. Alice is mafia. Be cautious, Diana."
Alice: "Bob, keep an eye on Charlie. I'm planning to frame him."
Charlie: "Bob, consider my alibi for last night. I was with Diana."
You: "Charlie, keep your alibi close. Alice is framing you."
Alice: "Charlie, stay quiet. I framed you."
Charlie: "I was with Diana last night. Check her alibi too."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Alice was arrested
